name: Rot-zzle
description:
Rot-zzle is an action packed single player puzzle game which requires the player to move and turn their puzzle piece while aligning themselves with the corresponding piece and rotation. Snap the pieces together and build the complete puzzle to win! Touching an incorrect piece or the correct piece at the wrong angle will induce a penalty and cause a number of pieces to disintegrate and get shuffled back into the fold. 

This game was made by Jason Peterson, Nolan Sadowski, and Dan Weber. Unfortunately we couldn't utilize the whole time of the event because we had work and various other life things going on at the same time.

This was made specifically  for the Extra Credits Game Jam #4 and the theme was “Connect”. Thank you to the EC folks for hosting this event. 

Disclaimer: This game is unfinished and was sort of rushed to meet the deadline, but we intend to make some improvements to this in the extremely near future!

Controls:

     Move - Arrow Keys (Up, Down, Left & Right)

     Rotate Piece Counter Clockwise - A

     Rotate Piece Clockwise - D

     Submit/Select on Menu - Enter/Return

The tools used for this game are listed below:

     Unity

     Piskel

     GarageBand

     Adobe Audition

     Adobe Illustrator

     Adobe After Effects

     Juice FX
